page.title: 05The Night Club and Disco
page.content: The local{Night Club and Discotheque} called {Oscars}is open on three nights a week; Thursday, Friday and Saturday. Thursday night is Party Night when usually 1,400 people attend from a very wide surrounding area. On Saturday nights very famous DJ's often appear. On Friday nights you have to be over 23 years of age to get in. The Night Club is situated on the Longleat Estate very close to Longleat House and uses the same car park for its visitors. About 40 people work there, mostly from the Village.
